ruleset.name: customNaming
ruleset.description: This ruleset checks the CDK sources for bad code.

rule.name: CDK_LongVariable
rule.message: Avoid excessively long variable names like {0}
rule.description: Detects when a field, formal or local variable is declared with a long name. This rule customized the default LongVariable rule by allowing names of a length up to 30.
